headline: US consumers continue to seek value: What recent earnings tell us
summary: Walmart's (WMT) second quarter earnings results show that American consumers are continuing to look for value. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma joins Mind Your Money with Allie Canal to discuss the rise in value-seeking consumer behavior, highlighting recent statements from executives of consumer-facing brands this earnings cycle. Read more: US households are looking for low-cost alternatives everywhere Sign up for the Mind Your Money newsletter, and for more information and tools to help you handle your finances, click here. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Mind Your Money.
